thread.title: Manchester United transfer news: Jose Mourinho doing all he can to keep David de Gea | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manchester United transfer news: Jose Mourinho doing all he can to keep David de Gea | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manchester United transfer news: Jose Mourinho doing all he can to keep David de Gea | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 12:33 pm Jose Mourinho is pulling all the stops to keep David de Gea (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho is doing all he can to make David de Gea feel at home at the club amid transfer interest from Real Madrid. Rumour Mill: our round-up of football gossip, rumours and speculation 
The Spanish giants are long-time admirers of the 26-year-old shot-stopper, who has established himself as one of United’s most important players in recent years. 
Real are after a new goalkeeper this summer, with Chelsea’s Thibaut Courtois also a top target of theirs, but Mourinho is already doing his bit to ensure De Gea is happy at Old Trafford. David de Gea is wanted by Real Madrid (Picture: Getty) 
The Portuguese is keen to create a comfortable environment for his player, and has brought in goalkeeping coach Emilio Alvarez from Atletico Madrid as one big way of bringing Spain to England for him, according to Marca .
